Specimen Container(s): LifeScan OneTouch Ultra® Blood Glucose Monitoring System test strip
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): LifeScan OneTouch Ultra® Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Think Positive (t+) Diabetes Management System, a Bluetooth-enabled accessory for remote transmission and storage of blood glucose data from LifeScan OneTouch Ultra® meters
Indications for Use Summary: Enables patients at home to wirelessly transmit, store, and display blood glucose data obtained from LifeScan OneTouch Ultra® Blood Glucose Monitoring System to a Bluetooth cellular phone and remote database via the internet
